Today nobody is

surprised to hear that animals changed gradually over time and according to their environments,

but back in the 1800s

it was a "crazy" idea.

The history of the earth

is much longer than

we had thought, and life has gradually evolved

over time.

That’s preposterous!

He’s a radical revolutionary!

And he wants

to overthrow

the government!

All life was created

at once by God.

It’s not yet time

to speak my ideas.

I’ve got to get all my thoughts together

before I can properly publish the results of

my research.

140
